statements: SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE doctor_id = 5678;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, diagnosis FROM healthcare_records WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_records WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%medication%';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, treatment_plan, doctor_id FROM healthcare_records ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_records WHERE patient_dob > '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records WHERE doctor_id = 500 and admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM healthcare_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%influenza%' AND treatment_plan IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_records ORDER BY admission_date DESC, patient_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_address FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords JOIN Patients ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.doctor_name='Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT  patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Female' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID-19%';
SELECT patient_id, doctor_name, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE prescription IS NOT NULL AND record_id > 100 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE qualification='MD';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, record_date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN Doctors ON Doctors.doctor_id = MedicalRecords.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT d.doctor_name, m.diagnosis FROM Doctors d JOIN MedicalRecords m ON d.doctor_id = m.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialty, years_of_experience FROM doctors WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, reason FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' AND years_of_experience > 5 ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT hospital_name, address, total_doctors FROM hospitals WHERE total_doctors > 50 ORDER BY total_doctors DESC, hospital_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_id, specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, reason FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT name, dosage, instructions FROM Medications WHERE name LIKE 'Aspirin%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, reason FROM Appointments WHERE status='Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT name, dosage, instructions FROM Medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment, admission_date FROM MedicalHistory WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
